name: SurviveCovid-19
description:
The world is under lock-down after a deadly virus threatens to end humanity. Collect essential amenities for your survival while keeping in mind the best practices to stop the virus from spreading. 

An initiative by Research in Intelligent Software and Human Analytics (RISHA) Lab, IIT Tirupati

Made by: V DHEERAJ ( vdheeraj.official@gmail.com )

Mentor: Dr. Sridhar Chimalakonda  (ch@iittp.ac.in)

Game backup in second account

: https://survivecovid-19.itch.io/game2020)
